price: Nokorԑ sԑ ͻno anaa ԑno ne dɔnhwere no nimdeε ho nsεnkyerεnee, enti monhwε na moamma moadwen annyε mo ntanta wͻ ho na monni m’akyi. Wei ne ͻkwan tenenee no.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَعِلۡمٞ لِّلسَّاعَةِ فَلَا تَمۡتَرُنَّ بِهَا وَٱتَّبِعُونِۚ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٞ مُّسۡتَقِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-innahu laʿil'mun lilssāʿati falā tamtarunna bihā wa-ittabiʿūni hādhā ṣirāṭun mus'taqīmun
